comment.body:
`[style^="overflow:"]` is redundant
> debenhams.com#?#div[class^="container_"]:has(> div[data-test-id="cookie-banner"])

or 
`debenhams.com#?#div[class^="container_"] > div[data-test-id="cookie-banner"]:upward(1)`

Since there doesn't even seem to be an actual tool called "McAfee Safe Browsing", I propose:
```
||saferedirects.xyz^$all
||online-guard.com^$all
/mcafee-safe-browsing/?*=*&*=*&*=*&*=*&*=*&*=$document,popup
```

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.facebook.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.facebook.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @Jean-PierreJ > I have been off Facebook for a while and just started up again about a week ago. I noticed the odd ad coming through so updated all filters. That didn’t work, so I activated all of the free filters and options. Unfortunately, Facebook seems to have found a way around this. ### Screenshots

AdGuard gets detected on a website

Mobile

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, EasyList, List-KR, YousList

issue.title: Scam domain report
issue.body:
Здравствуйте!

Домен [https://dumpishop.ru/](https://dumpishop.ru/?ref=10767) является мошенническим и предназначен для выманивания платёжных данных.

К примеру по следующей ссылке:
https://dumpishop.ru/category/keys

Для вашего удобства создал аккаунт:
Логин/пароль: Scamrrrrrr/1234567

Продаются СКАМ ключи к псевдо валютам (скрин 1). После выбора ранодомного «товара» (http://dumpishop.ru/eshop_show/46) предлагается пополнить баланс (скрин 2). После получения ошибки, переходим во вкладку «пополнения баланса» (скрин 3). И выбираем рандомную платёжную систему (скрин 4). После нажатия на кнопку пополнить, мошеннический сайт просит ввести сумму в рублях (скрин 5). Пусть будет 900. После нажатия на кнопку оплаты, попадаем на мошенническую страницу с просьбой перевести деньги на мобильный номер (скрин 6) и текстом «По просьбам наших пользователей, мы отключили стандартный мерчант QIWI и установили способ пополнения "Прямым переводом".»

Скриншоты:

https://i.ibb.co/GtGZGsj/67-F3-A3-AB-DDFF-46-B2-82-E9-024-EB68-C9-EE7.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/ssbSPTz/AB0-C12-E7-EB8-D-49-FE-9-B9-D-D856-BACE7-E82.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/5cqQ95s/CF613593-897-E-4-A85-85-AC-CC67-BA0-FC1-C2.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/3rrpzWK/07-EAA358-4-ACA-49-FD-942-A-7-F0-A61129745.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/CnwZrnF/56-BB80-CE-75-D2-4332-A225-10-EFD0-E4-B115.jpg
https://i.ibb.co/QDt06vc/97658-FC9-BB4-C-4-F4-C-9-B72-F2166-A9-B50-F6.jpg

Прошу принять меры и заблокировать указанный ресурс.

@Alex-302 no dice :/
1) Uninstalled and removed all files using this guide https://kb.adguard.com/en/macos/installation#uninstall
2) Removed the Adguard "VPN" from Network settings
3) Reinstalled AdGuard
4) Skipped the initial setup to keep the default settings
I still get the exact same issue (Unsafe JavaScript attempt to initiate navigation for frame with URL xxx from frame with URL YYY. The frame attempting navigation of the top-level window is cross-origin or untrusted and the user has never interacted with the frame.)

issue.title: m.search.naver.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.search.naver.com/search.naver?sm=mtp_hty.top&where=m&query=

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, EasyList, List-KR, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. If AdGuard is turned on on the NAVER search results page, the layout will be broken, image search will not load results, and some elements will not work, such as advanced search or view more results. Conversely, if you turn off AdGuard completely, it will display normally (font size and rows do not change), and some elements will also work normally.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![F5BF9D8E-846F-4CF5-806E-49F68C379641](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/177201530-8bc45621-5d89-4c58-923c-4f770c09c409.jpeg)

</details>

![9CEAE005-0D23-430A-B42D-241D1FB9D421](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/177201581-a71205e3-54b8-432e-899f-5ec10520b7d2.jpeg)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 3:</summary>

![A5927544-747F-4625-8B39-074B3EB3C44A](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/177201629-a178c8c9-3c26-48f6-a189-84bb1938f7c8.jpeg)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 4:</summary>

![0E4D4984-DEAC-42ED-BD38-955F533DA44A](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/177201661-84b780c1-34b4-4957-a44d-d3a748074c57.jpeg)
